name: Paradise Lost: FPS Cosmic Horror Game
description: An Spec Ops team was sent to a planet to investigate a disappearance of a research team. What lies beneath this god-forsaken planet?
minimum_requirements: OS: indows 7 64bit Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: 3 ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 7 GB available space
